name: BuildingRequests
description: A BuildingRequests object is a container for a Player's desired GroupOfChanges objects involving builds and demolitions. BuildingRequests are kept separate from other changes a Player wishes to make to the GameState so that the HousingResolver can settle building conflicts before applying them.

instanceVariables.name: _house_builds
instanceVariables.description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for house builds

instanceVariables.name: _hotel_builds
instanceVariables.description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for hotel builds

instanceVariables.name: _house_demolitions
instanceVariables.description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for house demolitions

instanceVariables.name: _hotel_demolitions
instanceVariables.description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for hotel demolitions

instanceVariables.name: _houses_built
instanceVariables.description: The total number of houses built in these BuildingRequests

instanceVariables.name: _hotels_built
instanceVariables.description: The total number of hotels built in these BuildingRequests

instanceVariables.name: _houses_demolished
instanceVariables.description: The total number of houses demolished in these BuildingRequests

instanceVariables.name: _hotels_demolished
instanceVariables.description: The total number of hotels demolished in these BuildingRequests
